thread.title: Alopecia: Katie Hale on going bald at a young age
thread.title_full: Alopecia: Katie Hale on going bald at a young age | DailyTelegraph

author: Katie Hale
title: Alopecia: Katie Hale on going bald at a young age
text:
OVER the past two months, I have lost all my hair.
I’m a healthy, 23-year-old living in Sydney. I work a job I absolutely adore, I’m surrounded by even greater friends and family. I have nothing to complain about.
But losing my hair absolutely broke me.
A day at the races. This was the day in April Katie Hale (right) noticed a small bald spot on the side of her head.
From the 1st of September (left) to the 8th of September the difference was noticeable.
The emotional day of the big shave.
Rocking it.
Katie Hale loving life.
1 of n
